Sql.query: SELECT * FROM CAM_FORMATOD1ADET4 WHERE FORMATOD1ACODI = :FORMATOD1ACODI AND IND_DEL = :IND_DEL ORDER BY ANIO

INSERT INTO CAM_FORMATOD1ADET4 ( FORMATOD1ADET4CODI, FORMATOD1ACODI, ANIO, MONTOINVERSION, USU_CREACION, FEC_CREACION, IND_DEL ) VALUES ( :FORMATOD1ADET4CODI, :FORMATOD1ACODI, :ANIO, :MONTOINVERSION, :USU_CREACION, :FEC_CREACION, :IND_DEL )

UPDATE CAM_FORMATOD1ADET4 SET ANIO = :ANIO, MONTOINVERSION = :MONTOINVERSION, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION, IND_DEL = :IND_DEL, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE FORMATOD1ADET4CODI = :FORMATOD1ADET4CODI

UPDATE CAM_FORMATOD1ADET4 SET IND_DEL = :IND_DEL, USU_MODIFICACION = :USU_MODIFICACION, FEC_MODIFICACION = :FEC_MODIFICACION WHERE FORMATOD1ACODI IN (SELECT FORMATOD1ACODI FROM CAM_FORMATOD1A WHERE PROYCODI = :PROYCODI AND IND_DEL = '0' ) AND IND_DEL = '0'
SELECT * FROM CAM_FORMATOD1ADET4 WHERE FORMATOD1ADET4CODI = :ID AND IND_DEL = :IND_DEL
SELECT * FROM CAM_FORMATOD1ADET4 ORDER BY FORMATOD1ADET4CODI DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY
